title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: So sad for any man to die like this even from his best friend   but maybe its is just Karmahttps://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11476843/Hunter-shot-dead-DOG-pet-stepped-loaded-shotgun.html

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Rest in peace to the guy, sounds like a freak accident. These things can happen which is why all precautions must be made, he shouldn’t have left the gun loaded in the vicinity of the dog if he wasn’t actively hunting at the time.I hope his family can find peace & the dog is looked after & loved. I hate reading about death, life can be cut short in an instant, such a tragic loss.

comments.author: eXPHorizon
comments.body: Dog was like : You did not feed me for Days you old fart , time to pay...  Anyway rest in peace

comments.author: ibminer
comments.body: This is a pretty messed up way to go, but judging by the pictures, if he hadn't been grabbing them all by the throats all the time.. maybe things might have turned out differently.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Such a heartbreaking story, that this man was shot, literally by his best friend. A dog, of all things, what an obscene way to pass away. This would have not been something the dog would have ever wanted to happen. This man had a death wish by loading his guns already. I guess that when you live in another country there is no such thing as gun safety. We never know when how long we are left on earth. I believe what is ethical this is an accident, the dog should not be disciplined or put to death. At least that man passed knowing that he lived his life to the fullest.

comments.author: TOMmiendfd
comments.body: Quote from: Jennifer Walters on November 30, 2022, 12:46:38 AMSo sad for any man to die like this even from his best friend   but maybe its is just Karmahttps://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11476843/Hunter-shot-dead-DOG-pet-stepped-loaded-shotgun.htmlSounds incredible, more like a joke, but sadly the owner himself. Maybe the dog wants freedom, or the respect it deserves. It is a queer story indeed, and the most faithful animal does kill a murderer

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: Lol this so funny how would a dog killed his hunter by it Own

comments.author: Minhxx
comments.body: I'm in Asia, a country that doesn't fear guns. I'm so lucky to be born here.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Can you imagine! You are sitting and relaxing, suddenly a dog shots you dead! Wtf?

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: Jennifer Walters on November 30, 2022, 12:46:38 AMSo sad for any man to die like this even from his best friend   but maybe its is just Karmahttps://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11476843/Hunter-shot-dead-DOG-pet-stepped-loaded-shotgun.htmlSad to hear something that unexpected resulting to killing , His best friend and buddy killed Him without any intention .RIP to the man and condolences to His losses .
